summary: This mod allows you to convert an amount (user-configurable) of dragon souls into a perk point.
descriptionHtml:
[b]= Description =[/b]
This mod allows you to convert an amount (user-configurable) of dragon souls into a perk point. It can be configured via soulstoperks.ini. By default you can convert 10 dragon souls to 1 perk point.

To convert, press the [b][i]apostrophe/quotation mark[/i][/b] (\' or \") key. This key is configurable in the ini file.

[b]= Requirements =[/b]
This plugin requires [url=http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon]Script Dragon[/url] in order to function.

[b]= Installation =[/b]
Extract the asi folder to your <Skyrim>/data folder, or use the Nexus Mod Manager. Folder structure should be:
<Skyrim>/data/asi/soulsToPerks.asi
<Skyrim>/data/asi/soulsToPerks.ini

[b]= Uninstalling =[/b]
Delete soulstoperks.asi and soulstoperks.ini from the install directory.

[b]= Frequently Asked Questions =[/b]
Q: Is Script Dragon/this mod compatible with Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)?
A: Yes, 100%. Keep in mind that this mod requires Script Dragon, not SKSE.

Q: This mod doesn\'t work!
A: Post in the comments and I\'ll try to help you. Please post the version of Skyrim you are using, the version of the mod that you are using (please update to the latest! Redownload if you are unsure), and any relevant information.

[b]= Credits =[/b]
Alexander Blade, for authoring Script Dragon.
Reddit\'s jesusondrugs for the original idea.
hitachihex\'s functions were used to get the player and set/get perk points.
The ini file was based off of xenofixus\'s.

A special thanks to some testers who helped me find that setav is bugged for dragonsouls, and that modav was needed: blattgeist, icanrawrbetter, reccondo, Alletha, Kaelik, Kyler45, and MinshiH. You all rock.

[b]= Contact =[/b]
NullCascade on the [url=http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums]Bethesda forums[/url] or Lordrea on the Nexus sites. Please let me know of any bugs or improvements.

[b]= Source =[/b]
All of my modifications are released under public domain, except where another\'s code is embedded. If you have a question, please feel free to contact me.

The source files can be found at [url=https://github.com/NullCascade/Null-s-Elder-Scrolls-Modifications]my GitHub page[/url].

[b]= Change Log =[/b]
1.0 - Initial release.
1.1 - Changed from setav to modav for dragon souls, fixing a bug that added souls due to how that function is wonky.
1.2 - Added a check to see if the player is the menus. The mod won\'t read the key press if you\'re renaming something now!
1.3 - Added support for Skyrim v1.2. Optimized the plugin (it uses slightly less memory).
1.4 - Fixed a minor Skyrim v1.3 bug.
1.5 - Updated for v1.3.10.0 of Skyrim.
1.6 - Updated for v1.4.21.0, should be compatible with the Nexus Mod Manager.
author: NullCascade
